metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6829 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When performing EC scalar point multiplication, the wNAF point multiplication algorithm was used; which leaked partial information about the nonce used during signature generation. Given an electro-magnetic trace of a few signature generations, the private key could have been computed. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 80 and Firefox for Android < 80.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
